trans-unit.source: Get Blob Service Properties
trans-unit.target: Get Blob Service Properties

trans-unit.source: Get Blob Service Properties
trans-unit.target: Get Blob Service Properties

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Get Blob Service Properties</languageKeyword> operation gets the properties of a storage account’s Blob service, including properties for <link xlink:href="f6481e74-78db-4964-b149-16e09173f5e1" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Storage Analytics</link> and CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) rules.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Get Blob Service Properties</languageKeyword> operation gets the properties of a storage account’s Blob service, including properties for <link xlink:href="f6481e74-78db-4964-b149-16e09173f5e1" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Storage Analytics</link> and CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) rules.

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about CORS rules and evaluation logic, see <link xlink:href="a7d724fb-63f9-41e2-944e-23af461ec123" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) Support for the Azure Storage Services</link>.
trans-unit.target: For detailed information about CORS rules and evaluation logic, see <link xlink:href="a7d724fb-63f9-41e2-944e-23af461ec123" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) Support for the Azure Storage Services</link>.

trans-unit.source: Request
trans-unit.target: Request

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Get Blob Service Properties</languageKeyword> request may be specified as follows.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Get Blob Service Properties</languageKeyword> request may be specified as follows.

trans-unit.source: HTTPS is recommended.
trans-unit.target: HTTPS is recommended.

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;account-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of your storage account:
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;account-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of your storage account:

trans-unit.target: Method

trans-unit.target: Request URI

trans-unit.target: HTTP Version

trans-unit.source: GET
trans-unit.target: GET

trans-unit.source: HTTP/1.1
trans-unit.target: HTTP/1.1

trans-unit.source: Note that the URI must always include the forward slash (/) to separate the host name from the path and query portions of the URI.
trans-unit.target: Note that the URI must always include the forward slash (/) to separate the host name from the path and query portions of the URI.

trans-unit.source: In the case of this operation, the path portion of the URI is empty.
trans-unit.target: In the case of this operation, the path portion of the URI is empty.

trans-unit.target: URI Parameter

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: The combination of both query strings is required to get the storage service properties.
trans-unit.target: The combination of both query strings is required to get the storage service properties.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: The <parameterReference>timeout</parameterReference> parameter is expressed in seconds.
trans-unit.target: The <parameterReference>timeout</parameterReference> parameter is expressed in seconds.

trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="9ae411fa-1495-42a0-bc26-c41ebca9d5b8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Setting Timeouts for Blob Service Operations</link>.

trans-unit.source: Description

trans-unit.source: Logging
trans-unit.target: Logging

trans-unit.source: Groups the Azure Analytics <legacyBold>Logging</legacyBold> settings.
trans-unit.target: Groups the Azure Analytics <legacyBold>Logging</legacyBold> settings.

trans-unit.source: Metrics
trans-unit.target: Metrics

trans-unit.source: Groups the Azure Analytics <system>Metrics</system> settings.
trans-unit.target: Groups the Azure Analytics <system>Metrics</system> settings.

trans-unit.source: The <legacyBold>Metrics</legacyBold> settings provide a summary of request statistics grouped by API in hourly aggregates for blobs.
trans-unit.target: The <legacyBold>Metrics</legacyBold> settings provide a summary of request statistics grouped by API in hourly aggregates for blobs.

trans-unit.source: HourMetrics
trans-unit.target: HourMetrics

trans-unit.source: Groups the Azure Analytics <legacyBold>HourMetrics</legacyBold> settings.
trans-unit.target: Groups the Azure Analytics <legacyBold>HourMetrics</legacyBold> settings.

trans-unit.source: The <legacyBold>HourMetrics</legacyBold> settings provide a summary of request statistics grouped by API in hourly aggregates for blobs.
trans-unit.target: The <legacyBold>HourMetrics</legacyBold> settings provide a summary of request statistics grouped by API in hourly aggregates for blobs.

trans-unit.source: MinuteMetrics
trans-unit.target: MinuteMetrics

trans-unit.source: Groups the Azure Analytics <legacyBold>MinuteMetrics</legacyBold> settings.
trans-unit.target: Groups the Azure Analytics <legacyBold>MinuteMetrics</legacyBold> settings.

trans-unit.source: The <legacyBold>MinuteMetrics</legacyBold> settings provide request statistics for each minute for blobs.
trans-unit.target: The <legacyBold>MinuteMetrics</legacyBold> settings provide request statistics for each minute for blobs.

trans-unit.source: The version of Storage Analytics currently in use.
trans-unit.target: The version of Storage Analytics currently in use.

trans-unit.source: Applies only to logging configuration.
trans-unit.target: Applies only to logging configuration.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether delete requests are being logged.
trans-unit.target: Indicates whether delete requests are being logged.

trans-unit.source: Applies only to logging configuration.
trans-unit.target: Applies only to logging configuration.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether read requests are being logged.
trans-unit.target: Indicates whether read requests are being logged.

trans-unit.source: Applies only to logging configuration.
trans-unit.target: Applies only to logging configuration.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether write requests are being logged.
trans-unit.target: Indicates whether write requests are being logged.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether metrics are enabled for the Blob service.
trans-unit.target: Indicates whether metrics are enabled for the Blob service.

trans-unit.source: If read-access geo-redundant replication is enabled, both primary and secondary metrics are collected.
trans-unit.target: If read-access geo-redundant replication is enabled, both primary and secondary metrics are collected.

trans-unit.source: If read-access geo-redundant replication is not enabled, only primary metrics are collected.
trans-unit.target: If read-access geo-redundant replication is not enabled, only primary metrics are collected.

trans-unit.source: Applies only to metrics configuration.
trans-unit.target: Applies only to metrics configuration.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether metrics generate summary statistics for called API operations.
trans-unit.target: Indicates whether metrics generate summary statistics for called API operations.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a retention policy is enabled for the storage service.
trans-unit.target: Indicates whether a retention policy is enabled for the storage service.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the number of days that metrics or logging data is retained.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the number of days that metrics or logging data is retained.

trans-unit.source: All data older than this value will be deleted.
trans-unit.target: All data older than this value will be deleted.

trans-unit.source: <system>DefaultServiceVersion</system> indicates the default version to use for requests to the Blob service if an incoming request’s version is not specified.
trans-unit.target: <system>DefaultServiceVersion</system> indicates the default version to use for requests to the Blob service if an incoming request’s version is not specified.

trans-unit.source: Values include version 2008-10-27 and more recent versions.
trans-unit.target: Values include version 2008-10-27 and more recent versions.

trans-unit.source: For more information on applicable versions, see <link xlink:href="cc4fba5c-7015-40bf-a29c-b6f0c684ff3c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Storage Service Versioning</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information on applicable versions, see <link xlink:href="cc4fba5c-7015-40bf-a29c-b6f0c684ff3c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Storage Service Versioning</link>.

trans-unit.source: Groups all CORS rules.
trans-unit.target: Groups all CORS rules.

trans-unit.source: CorsRule
trans-unit.target: CorsRule

trans-unit.source: Groups settings for a CORS rule.
trans-unit.target: Groups settings for a CORS rule.

trans-unit.source: AllowedOrigins
trans-unit.target: AllowedOrigins

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list of origin domains that are allowed via CORS, or "*" if all domains are allowed.
trans-unit.target: A comma-separated list of origin domains that are allowed via CORS, or "*" if all domains are allowed.

trans-unit.source: ExposedHeaders
trans-unit.target: ExposedHeaders

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list of response headers to expose to CORS clients.
trans-unit.target: A comma-separated list of response headers to expose to CORS clients.

trans-unit.source: MaxAgeInSeconds
trans-unit.target: MaxAgeInSeconds

trans-unit.source: The number of seconds that the client/browser should cache a preflight response.
trans-unit.target: The number of seconds that the client/browser should cache a preflight response.

trans-unit.source: AllowedHeaders
trans-unit.target: AllowedHeaders

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list of headers allowed to be part of the cross-origin request.
trans-unit.target: A comma-separated list of headers allowed to be part of the cross-origin request.

trans-unit.source: AllowedMethods
trans-unit.target: AllowedMethods

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list of HTTP methods that are allowed to be executed by the origin.
trans-unit.target: A comma-separated list of HTTP methods that are allowed to be executed by the origin.

trans-unit.source: For Azure Storage, permitted methods are DELETE, GET, HEAD, MERGE, POST, OPTIONS or PUT.
trans-unit.target: For Azure Storage, permitted methods are DELETE, GET, HEAD, MERGE, POST, OPTIONS or PUT.

trans-unit.source: Authorization
trans-unit.target: Authorization

trans-unit.source: Only the storage account owner may call this operation.
trans-unit.target: Only the storage account owner may call this operation.
